name: Kurt Hansen
description: Kurt Hansenis the leader ofDogtownand an antagonist inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Hansen is the unofficial leader of Dogtown and the commander ofBARGHEST. His military background doesn't mean he just acts in violence, as Hansen's keen intellect and strategic prowess make him a formidable rival to his enemies.To some, Hansen is simply a gangster or a terrorist, while others see him as a charismatic leader that was able to create a paradise safe from corporate and police influence. Born in theNew United States of America(blood type A+),Hansen was a member of a juvenile gang before enlisting...
